  <div class="contentContainer"> 
   <ul class="blockList"> 
    <li class="blockList"> 
     <table class="typeSummary" border="0" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" summary="Class Summary table, listing classes, and an explanation"> 
      <caption>
       <span>Class Summary</span>
       <span class="tabEnd">&nbsp;</span>
      </caption> 
      <tbody>
       <tr> 
        <th class="colFirst" scope="col">Class</th> 
        <th class="colLast" scope="col">Description</th> 
       </tr> 
      </tbody>
      <tbody> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Abs.html" title="class in jason.functions">Abs</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.abs(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.abs(N).
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/acos.html" title="class in jason.functions">acos</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.acos(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.acos(N), returns the arc cosine of a value; the returned angle is in the range 0.0 through pi.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/asin.html" title="class in jason.functions">asin</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.asin(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.asin(N), returns the arc sine of a value; the returned angle is in the range -pi/2 through pi/2.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/atan.html" title="class in jason.functions">atan</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.atan(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.atan(N), returns the arc tangent of a value; the returned angle is in the range -pi/2 through pi/2.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Average.html" title="class in jason.functions">Average</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.average(L)</code></b>: returns the average of all values of L.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/ceil.html" title="class in jason.functions">ceil</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.ceil(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.ceil(N), returns the smallest double value that is not less than the argument and is equal to a mathematical integer.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/cos.html" title="class in jason.functions">cos</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.cos(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.cos(N), returns the trigonometric cosine of an angle.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Count.html" title="class in jason.functions">Count</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>.count(B)</code></b>: counts the number of occurrences of a particular belief (pattern) in the agent's belief base, as the internal action .count.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/e.html" title="class in jason.functions">e</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.e</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.E.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/floor.html" title="class in jason.functions">floor</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.floor(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.floor(N), returns the largest double value that is not greater than the argument and is equal to a mathematical integer.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Length.html" title="class in jason.functions">Length</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>.length(L)</code></b>: returns the size of either the list or string L.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/log.html" title="class in jason.functions">log</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.log(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.log(N), returns the natural logarithm (base e) of N.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Max.html" title="class in jason.functions">Max</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.max(N1,N2)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.max(N1,N2).
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Min.html" title="class in jason.functions">Min</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.min(N1,N2)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.min(N1,N2).
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/pi.html" title="class in jason.functions">pi</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.pi</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.PI.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Random.html" title="class in jason.functions">Random</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.random(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.random; If N is not informed: returns a value greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0; If N is informed: returns a value greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than N.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Round.html" title="class in jason.functions">Round</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.round(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.round(N); returns the closest integer to the argument.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/RuleToFunction.html" title="class in jason.functions">RuleToFunction</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Wraps a rule into a function.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/sin.html" title="class in jason.functions">sin</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.sin(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.sin(N), returns the trigonometric sine of an angle.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Sqrt.html" title="class in jason.functions">Sqrt</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.sqrt(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.sqrt(N); returns the correctly rounded positive square root of N.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/StdDev.html" title="class in jason.functions">StdDev</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.std_dev(L)</code></b>: returns the standard deviation of all values of L.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/Sum.html" title="class in jason.functions">Sum</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.sum(L)</code></b>: sums all values of L.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="altColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/tan.html" title="class in jason.functions">tan</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>math.tan(N)</code></b>: encapsulates java Math.tan(N), returns the trigonometric tangent of an angle.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
       <tr class="rowColor"> 
        <td class="colFirst"><a href="../../jason/functions/time.html" title="class in jason.functions">time</a></td> 
        <td class="colLast"> 
         <div class="block">
          Function: 
          <b><code>system.time</code></b>: encapsulates java System.currentTimeMillis(), returns the current time in milliseconds.
         </div> </td> 
       </tr> 
      </tbody> 
     </table> </li> 
   </ul>
